channel.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
channel.description:
[size=12pt]After a big break, another model from me. I was just boored. lol This one maybe isn't as epic as my other models...[/size]
[size=12pt]Sorry, no primitives. And i forgot to triangulate the handle. I created this sword from zero.. I call it "Fire Sword".[/size]
[size=12pt][b]Render:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/3357/renderfiresword.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt][b]This Chinese symbol on sword, means "Fire":[/b][/size] [IMG]http://img574.imageshack.us/img574/850/renderfiresymbol.jpg[/img] [size=12pt](Yeah, I Googled it. I'm just sayin'...)[/size]
[size=12pt][b]Wireframe n' Stuff:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2q04nds.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/20swvhh.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Download Link:[/b][/size] [size=12pt][URL=http://uppit.com/gsmqzf8222j3/Fire_Sword.zip]Uppit.com - Fire_Sword.zip[/URL][/size]
[size=12pt][b][i]P.S. I would be very happy, to see how it looks in a RSPS.[/i][/b][/size]

item.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:18, topic:368567”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=464716.msg3449189#msg3449189 date=1293623543]
So you go from that RPG launcher, back to this? I knew you were a leecher but no one believed me

if I’m wrong, make us some more epic prim models
[/quote]
In all honesty the RPG was rather simple… Just take a look at the frame. Just a bunch of touching prims.[/quote]

My point was that, if your using primitives why would you go back to tracing?

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

He should show pictures of quads instead of triangles. And just because something is traced doesn’t mean it has to be in triangles. And if it is triangulated because he is releasing it, then how come the handle isn’t triangulated?

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:12, topic:368567”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=464716.msg3398685#msg3398685 date=1289704930]

btw, it’s better if it’s not triangulated.

It’s not triangulated, it’s just traced, and therefor naturally like that. You can tell it isn’t b’c of the handle.
[/quote]I know but he said this in his first post:

[quote author=Eyfia link=topic=464716.msg3398258#msg3398258 date=1289675092]
[size=12pt]Sorry, no primitives. And i forgot to triangulate the handle.

[/quote][/quote]

It’s triangulated because he’s releasing it.

Read full topic

It’s not triangulated, it’s just traced, and therefor naturally like that. You can tell it isn’t b’c of the handle.[/quote]I know but he said this in his first post:

item.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[Tut]Basic Primitives sword[Tut] (Picture heavy!)

Eeh comment that out, didnt have my glasses on. Im legally blind in one eye lol. Sorry about that, yea it is a cube

Also am I not allowed to agree with you? I just didn’t feel like quoting you and posted like the newfags nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:7, topic:368567”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=464716.msg3398279#msg3398279 date=1289676657]

I suspect that this needs a little more work put into it.

Agreed, the handle needs to be more round, right now its a smashed cylinder. Umm, I’m not sure if my eye’s deceive me but I see a “patterned” blade there. Try to make it less patterened.
[/quote]
Forgetting your glasses again? It is a patterned look, but he didn’t create a segment and copypasta it though because the wireframe is different on each section. My suggestion is to work more on the blade and handle. The blade’s look is too repetitive and the handle needs something more to it than a cylinder ran over by a steam roller. And how come no prims? :([/quote]
You basically said what i did. And no, the only part that is a primitive is the handle. Rest is very obviously traced.

Offtopic - Bout the glass’s, no, I just don’t like to wear them lmfao. Also a little suprised you knew bout dose

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Fire Sword!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:4, topic:368567”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=464716.msg3398265#msg3398265 date=1289675624]
I suspect that this needs a little more work put into it.
[/quote]
Agreed, the handle needs to be more round, right now its a smashed cylinder. Umm, I’m not sure if my eye’s deceive me but I see a “patterned” blade there. Try to make it less patterened.[/quote]
Forgetting your glasses again? It is a patterned look, but he didn’t create a segment and copypasta it though because the wireframe is different on each section. My suggestion is to work more on the blade and handle. The blade’s look is too repetitive and the handle needs something more to it than a cylinder ran over by a steam roller. And how come no prims?

Read full topic

claunchii:

Someone needs to critisize this… it looks like a first time model i mean if you have modeled for a while you KNOW to use prims. The model doesn’t evan look like you could hold it its flat/ 2d remake it.

If only you knew more about models, that would actually be helpful to him.
